riskcode,

update LAPRODQUALI
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where riskcode = #{riskcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and QUALIFITYPE = #{myqualifitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
